The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\luisu\\OneDrive\\Documentos\\.serviceRawFile:
service: echopay-backend

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  stage: dev
  memorySize: 128
  timeout: 10
  environment:
    DB_USER: ${env:DB_USER}
    DB_PASS: ${env:DB_PASS}
    DB_SERVER: ${env:DB_SERVER}
    DB_NAME: ${env:DB_NAME}
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: "Allow"
      Action:
        - "logs:CreateLogGroup"
        - "logs:CreateLogStream"
        - "logs:PutLogEvents"
      Resource: "*"

functions:
  createPayment:
    handler: src/handlers/createPaymentHandler.handler
    description: Crear un nuevo pago
    events:
      - http:
          path: payments
          method: post
          cors: true

  getPayments:
    handler: src/handlers/getPaymentHandler.handler
    description: Obtener lista de pagos
    events:
      - http:
          path: payments
          method: get
          cors: true

plugins:
  - serverless-dotenv-plugin

custom:
  dotenv:
    path: .env
